revised_title: Araucarian Anatomy and Affinities: A Study of Comparative Anatomy and Relationships
tldr: The author examines the comparative anatomy of the Araucarineae, focusing on their relationship to the Cordaitales. Evidence from the anatomy of different regions of the plant supports the connection between the Araucarineae and Cordaitales. The study also refutes the idea of Abietinean ancestry of Araucarinese, providing a strong basis for the Araucarineae's superior antiquity and anatomical association with the Cordaitales.
